In Karen's description of the barn she invites her future guests to, "enjoy our vintage eclectic style" and that is exactly what you can expect. I found Kate's descriptions of "knick-knacks piled up" and "just piles of stuff to move out of the way" to be highly inaccurate. Lastly, there are not, "religious verses painted on every surface." There are some verses and other quotes incorporated into the decor. The barn offers plenty of open space interiorly and exteriorly. Karen has bettered the interior space with her creative finesse since the posted pictures were taken; it is cooler than you can imagine.
